inline disable() : Void

inherited from primevc.core.states.FiniteStateMachine
Disabling the FSM means that the current state can't change until it's enabled again. Before the FSM is disabled, the currentState is changed to the default-state.

overrides primevc.core.states.FiniteStateMachine
